name: DrawPlus Animation File
summary: Learn about .DPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Completed animations can be exported to .SWF, .MOV, .AVI, .WMV, and .GIF animation files.
NOTE: Serif discontinued DrawPlus in 2015. The last version of the software was X8.

description: Two-dimensional animation file created by DrawPlus, a graphics editing program; stores either a stopframe animation (a flip book-like animation), or a keyframe animation (a set of anchor frames used by the computer to generate a smooth animation); also supports visual effects and audio data.
